title: Learn Finnish While You Sleep:Country and nationality

media:group.media:title: Learn Finnish While You Sleep:Country and nationality
media:group.media:description:
Learn Finnish While You Sleep:Country and nationality For this lesson, we will have a closer look at these three topics: country,
nationality and languages and how to express those in Finnish.
Part 1: Country and nationality (Osa 1: Maa ja kansalaisuus)
First let us begin with the kind of question we can ask, if we want to know someone.
Kuka sinä olet ( who are you)
Mistä sinä olet kotoisin? ( where are you from?)
Minkä maalainen sinä olet? (What is your nationality?)
Mitä kieltä sinä puhut? ( What language do you speak?)
